snippet: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention is starting another round of graphic advertisements to try to get smokers to quit.
abstract: Editorial welcomes second round of Centers for Disease Control and Prevention's advertising campaign featuring gruesome images of effects of smoking tobacco; contends graphic images seems to have big effect on increasing number of people who will try to quit smoking.
lead_paragraph: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention is starting another round of graphic advertisements to try to get smokers to quit.

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
keywords.name: organizations
